name: Association Générale des Houblons de France
membership:
Comptoir Agricole - 67270 HOCHFELDEN France
Coophounord - 59270 BERTHEN France
memberOrga:
IHGC - International Hop Growers Convention
ACTA - Agence de coordination Technique Agricole
goal:
AGPH is the french main organization for the hop production and hop producers.
The main activities are:
- maintains the variety portfolio
- runs trials to fight against deseases
- contributes to the registration of new chemicals
- works to improve the agronomics of the hops.
euInitiatives:
- regulation for the certification of hops and hop products
- harmonization of the usage of chemicals
